node-url-expand
===

Simple and efficient URL expander with http native from node.


##Installation

```
npm install node-url-expand

```


##Usage

```js

var nodeUrlExpand = require('node-url-expand');

nodeUrlExpand('http://buff.ly/1zZrYP2', function (err, url) {

  console.log(url);

});

```
